### Submitted data

- See here: <https://github.com/unfaostatistics/regional15/data_region/RAP/>

```{r reg_plot1, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE,results='hold'}
library(gisfao)
library(rgdal)
library(ggplot2)
shape <- fao_world[which(fao_world[["RAP"]] == TRUE),]
shape <- spTransform(shape, CRS("+proj=robin"))
map.df <- fortify(shape)

shape2 <- spTransform(fao_world, CRS("+proj=robin"))
map.df2 <- fortify(shape2)

p <- ggplot()
p <- p + geom_polygon(data=map.df2,aes(long,lat,group=group), 
                      fill=NA, color=NA)
p <- p + geom_polygon(data=map.df,aes(long,lat,group=group), 
                      fill="#5087CE", color="white", size=.5)
p
```
